title: Employment by economic sector in Peru 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Agriculture, Industry, and Services. The y axis indicates the Share of individuals and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Agriculture, Industry, and Services are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Share of individuals in descending order is: 1. Services, 2. Agriculture, and lastly, 3. Industry.
Overall across the Year, Services mostly maintained the highest Share of individuals when compared to others with a mean value of 55.79, and it peaked at 2019.
After Services, Agriculture overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 27.8, peaking at 2009.
Industry mostly had the least Share of individuals with a mean value of 16.36, which peaked at 2012 with a value of 17.03.
